name: AllAboutDogsandPuppies
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Thinking of adopting a puppy, congratulation on being a fist time dog-owner. You will find useful tips on how, when, do and don’t here, we aim to make the world of canine ownership a wonderful one for you. Struggling to train your dog or want to learn how to train your dog as simple as ABC? You have come to the right place, we have compile some tips and hacks for you. So no more spending hours searching on Google or YouTube, finding yourself frustrated and overwhelm with too much information and ended up not knowing when and how to get started. The good news is, our dog training 101 resources have you covered, as our aim is to make dog training an enjoyable partnership between you and your four legged friend. How about some heartwarming, funny and amazing dogs and puppies stories and news that will blow your mind and melt your heart. Our dogs and puppies articles will keep you entertain and fall in love with your awesome friend all over again. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
